E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1977
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Bob Lee



Date: Monday, 6/2/1977
Subject: Progress of Mickey Hatcher
Dear Sir,
Mickey Hatcher is hitting the ball well at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .290, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1977
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Paul Blair
